result.title: TopCoder Web Arena â€” Knowing failed system test cases
result.content: Hey everyone, I am asking this question as I am new to TopCoder and having some issues with knowing the test cases on which my system testing failed. I know how to find the cases in the Applet but in the College I am behind proxy server. That is why it is easier to use Web Arena while I am in the college. Does anyone know how to find test cases where the system testing failed on Web Area?
